dialogue.content: I've been getting headaches more often.
When do they usually show up-morning, afternoon, or evening?
Afternoons, especially after long stretches on my laptop.
Any patterns you've noticed-stress, posture, hydration, meals?
Hydration is probably part of it. I realize late that I barely drank water.
Got it. Are you trying to prevent them, or just manage them when they hit?
Prevent them. I don't want to rely on painkillers unless I have to.
That's reasonable. Let's make the first step easy to repeat during work.
On heavy screen days, I just want a simple autopilot habit so it doesn't spiral.
